extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: APSC 171, APSC 172, APSC 174 and registered in BSCE.
EXCLUSION: MATH 225, MATH 226, MATH 231, MATH 235, MATH 237

basic.description: Introduction to ordinary differential equations and their applications to the physical and social sciences. Topics may include: numerical solutions, power series and series solutions, Laplace transforms.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Differential Equations
